thread.title: Yulia Skripal speaks after UK nerve agent attack

title: Yulia Skripal speaks after UK nerve agent attack
text:
Yulia Skripal speaks after UK nerve agent attack 7:55pm BST - 02:05 
Yulia Skripal has released her first statement since being poisoned last month with a nerve agent on UK soil. In doing so she's entered the increasingly hostile tussle between Russia and the UK, as both sides vie for their versions of the truth in the poisoning of Yulia and her ex-spy father. Jacob Greaves reports.
